description:
Are you running a community project or organising an event? If so, you'll have thought about applying for funding or sponsorship at some point.

Do you know one of the best ways to provide insight about your project or event? Video! Video has become one of the fastest ways to share information. A high quality video can provide viewers with an accurate insight into your project or event. The perfect opportunity to display all the positive implications!

However, there's certain attributes to include that can make your video stand out from all the others. Which will effectively support your funding/sponsorship applications.

This is what you'll learn here! You'll also gain specialist knowledge that has resulted in achieving 5-figure funding and sponsorship goals for many international events and community projects.

If you're looking to learn the powerful benefits of using video to gain funding and sponsorship - take the course now!
title: Gain Funding for your Community Project with Video
